INTERSECT Awarded!

NSF funds INTERSECT for 3 year project cycle

We are excited to announce that effective August 15, 2020 INTERSECT has begins its three year project cycle with NSF awards 2017424 and 2017259.

Ian Cosden 2020-08-15 ANNOUNCEMENT
NSF
